attributes.review: i downloaded this app as it was recommended by my dog’s pet bunny that he ate. the bunny’s final words were “download the trump 2020 app”. after hearing those words my dog accompanied by the coyotes in our neighborhood ate the bunny. i was sad because the poor bunny was just recommending an app and so i went and fulfilled its last wish by downloading it. when i got into the app there was a button that said “resurrect bunny” and when i clicked it my phone slowly transformed into a talking bunny!! this wasn’t the bunny that died!!! it was able to stand and talk and it grew to 7 feet tall i was terrified!! the bunny then walked out the house while saying “trump 2020” in a robotic voice and walked right over the black lives matter protestors starting various riots. i chased after it as it was my phone just moments ago and once it noticed me following, it grew double it’s size and started spraying liquid all over the city and it grew larger and larger eventually getting high enough to spread the liquid throughout america while repeating “china” in the same robotic voice. turns out the liquid had covid-19 sample in it and the bunny was able to terminate all humans that were contacted by this liquid. each day i wake up from flashback nightmares and ptsd about this event because the people that knew abt it are now no longer with us except for me. nobody believes me and no amount of therapy has been able to fix this. this app is very dangerous for our society and can lead to mass spread of the virus along with the announcement of racist phrases. if i didn’t dodge that one droplet i wouldn’t be here today. please take this as your warning. do not install this app if you would like to avoid irreversible trauma. don’t fall for it.
